titles: A motion against imprisonment, vvherein is proved that imprisonment for debt is against the Gospel, against the good of Church, and Commonwealth / by Thomas Grantham, Master in Arts; curate of Eston, neere Tocester in Northampton-sheire..
author: Grantham, Thomas, d. 1664.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
